"MISSION: Decision":
"In this quest, your objective is to complete 5 missions while only using the items you find along the way.

At the beginning of each mission after mission 1, you can choose which of two switches to step on.

Stepping on a switch deactivates a laser fence, allowing you to obtain the items inside.
You will not be able to obtain the items inside the other fence, so choose carefully."

"In MISSION: Decision, all weapons' Gear skills are learned from the start of the mission.

Use Gear effects well as you complete missions."
